text: Peter Sharis (born January 8, 1969) is an American rower. He competed in the men's coxless pair event at the 1992 Summer Olympics. He graduated from Harvard University and Vanderbilt University. ==References== Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:American male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of the United States Category:Rowers at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Salem, Massachusetts Category:Harvard Crimson rowers Category:Vanderbilt University alumni
title: Peter Sharis
